title: Rider Transfers: Everything You Need to Know about Changes in the Men’s Peloton for 2024
content:
From Primož Roglič's move to Bora-Hansgrohe to Mikel Landa's switch to Soudal Quick-Step, rider transfers ahead of the 2024 season.

Read the full article at Rider Transfers: Everything You Need to Know about Changes in the Men’s Peloton for 2024 on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
